title: Verb-Based Capability Expansion
description: New verbs must be used for new concepts/actions, and the system must generate new capabilities with new plugins.
rules: Each new capability requires a new verb definition
Verbs must integrate with the plugin ecosystem
Verbs must be discoverable and usable by the system
examples: Creating a new verb for a novel capability
Documenting verb specifications and usage patterns
Integrating new verbs with existing plugin ecosystem
Implementing proper input/output validation for verbs
Versioning verbs appropriately for backward compatibility
exceptions: Experimental verbs for testing new concepts
Internal verbs not meant for general system use
